name: Matchy Miners
description:
What is Matchy Miners?

Matchy Miners is a color matching game where you play as a miner that's collecting crystals. The crystals are fragile, cracking as they fall from the top to the bottom. The player has to collect the crystals in matching colored groups in order to maximize points while trying to minimize the damage. The player loses out on points if the crystals break completely!

How do I play Matchy Miners?

Play on PC for the best results. But you can play on mobile too!

What are the controls?

  • For PC (Windows version and Web):
    • Movement: WASD
    • Hit: Left click
    • Pause: Escape
  • For Mobile:
    • Movement: Click and drag
    • Hit: Tap once

Does this game support multiplayer?

Yes! The "Play" button is just normal single player. But the "Battle" button let's you play on a dedicated server with another person. The "Battle" mode only works on the Windows build!
